column4: Hi again, I can't get any joy out of my browser, & I get a '111 connection refused'  returned in TY. any ideas as to what is going on? I was on-line earlier today...
web browser problems? can't go on webpages?
any ideas? is there a general problem with browsers?
which browser?
ff 3
have you tried another browser?
I can't get online to download.....:-)
you  don't need a browser, to download programs into Ubuntu :D
what is the code, I assume this is done in term?
yeah exactly, your meant to  get most programs off Ubuntu's server.   either via the command line,  or the slow graphical way
two slow graphical ways to choose from
sudo apt-get install  galeon  ephipany-browser
epiphany probably won't add itself to the menu,  but you can open it by  running epiphany-browser from the terminal once installed.  and  galeon is rather nice as well :)
plus there are quite a few other browsers I could have told you to install :d
that are all good as well
thanks a lot, I will see wht occurs
are you on that computer using IRC?
heres the output???  'Could not connect to ftp.ticklers.org:80 (90.207.225.196). - connect (111 Connection refused)'
ftp what???????

W: Failed to fetch http://packages.medibuntu.org/dists/hardy/free/i18n/Translation-en_GB.bz2  Could not connect to packages.medibuntu.org:80 (88.191.82.11). - connect (111 Connection refused) [IP: 88.191.82.11 80]
is the general drift of the msgs
I don't understand how I can chat, but get refused connections when trying to FTP or browse, & I still don't get the '111' code? Is there ..,ah... I know
